abstract.t: This document describes EDS (Equivalent Differentiated Services), anew building-block for a simple, robust, free and scalable end-to-endservice differentiation in IP networks. The EDS scheme aims atproviding a spectrum of 'different but equivalent' network servicesthat offer a trade-off between delay and loss rate to the end-to-endflows. The EDS scheme can be deployed incrementally in the Internet.
